name: joel bot v 2.5.0
description: a WhatsApp bot developed by joel_tech any problem wa.me +255714595878,255781144539,255767570963

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically and send to you(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mod

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , the code you receive after scanning Qr code

NUMERO_OWNER.desc: Your number , dont put '+' and put you area code(exemple of togo '228')

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate that you are online even if you are not. 2 to indicate that you are currently typing a message. 3 to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

PM_CHATBOT.description: Put yes if you want the bot to automatically respond to messages in private

ANTI_VIEW_ONCE.description: Put yes if you want to receive in pm all view once content

ANTI_COMMAND_SPAM.description: active a cooldown of 10sec to every-user after a command to avoid spamming unless owner and mods
